Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles Clippers are looking to end their three-game road skid against the Denver Nuggets.
The Nuggets are leading the Western Conference with 19.8 fast break points per game, led by Christian Braun averaging 5.0.
The Clippers are fourth in the Western Conference in terms of defense, allowing only 107.9 points per game and holding opponents to 45.9% shooting.
Nikola Jokic is averaging 31.5 points, 13 rebounds, 9.7 assists, and 1.7 steals for the Nuggets.
James Harden is scoring 21.6 points per game with 6.1 rebounds and 8.0 assists for the Clippers.
